channel.title: Cliped npcs?
channel.description:
is it in server or client sided?
i found stuff that starts with
tiles.put(0
for cliped stuff. where do i add it?

item.title: Cliped npcs?
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

its in a txt document called clipped spots
its server sided
it should look something like this:

tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2872 << 14 | 9752, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2871 << 14 | 9752, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2870 << 14 | 9752, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2869 << 14 | 9752, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2869 << 14 | 9751, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2868 << 14 | 9751, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2867 << 14 | 9751, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2867 << 14 | 9752, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2866 << 14 | 9752, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2865 << 14 | 9753, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2865 << 14 | 9754, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2864 << 14 | 9754, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2864 << 14 | 9755, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2864 << 14 | 9757, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2863 << 14 | 9757, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2863 << 14 | 9758, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2862 << 14 | 9758, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2861 << 14 | 9758, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2860 << 14 | 9758, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2859 << 14 | 9758, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2858 << 14 | 9758, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2858 << 14 | 9757, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2858 << 14 | 9757, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2857 << 14 | 9756, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2856 << 14 | 9756, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2856 << 14 | 9754, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2856 << 14 | 9753, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2856 << 14 | 9747, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2856 << 14 | 9746, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2856 << 14 | 9745, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2857 << 14 | 9745, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2857 << 14 | 9745, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2857 << 14 | 9744, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2857 << 14 | 9743, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2858 << 14 | 9743, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2858 << 14 | 9742, true); tiles.put(0 << 28 | 2858 << 14 | 9742, true);
